lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins have rejected a bid to buy the team that had been put together by a group that included the Dallas Mavericks’ owner, Mark Cuban, and the former N.F.L. quarterback Dan Marino, the group’s financier said.
snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins have rejected a bid to buy the team that had been put together by a group that included the Dallas Mavericks’ owner, Mark Cuban, and the former N.F.L. quarterback Dan Marino, the group’s financier said.
